sentence.Network_en: Can you think I would be so heartlessly treacherous?
sentence.Network_cn: 难道你认为我会那样残酷地背信弃义?

sentence.Network_en: She heartlessly sold people into slavery for her own profit.
sentence.Network_cn: 她丧尽天良地为私利而贩卖奴隶.

sentence.Network_en: Selfishly heartlessly shivers your mine together dream it!
sentence.Network_cn: 自私把你我的共同梦想无情地将它敲碎!
